entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • StreamReader.ReadLineAsync() blocks on empty stdin in .NET 7 RC 2 #77358
  • GetPathRoot of windows path on unix machine. #77352
  • build-rootfs.sh doesn't work on WSL - add to docs #77348

Closed

  • IDBFS undefined issue! #77329
  • Keep LineNumber, BytePositionInLine and Path when calling JsonSerializer.Deserialize<TValue>(ref reader) #77345
  • Is it safe to ignore the sessionId on a process to detect it as service? #77350

PullRequests

Created

  • SPMI: Collect some more info when no file exists #77361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Override ReadAsync and WriteAsync methods on ConsoleStream." #77360
    area-System.Console
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Allow some intrinsics in Tier0 (e.g. Enum.HasFlag) #77357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77355
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fold static readonly struct X = <zero> to a jit-time const, e.g. Guid.Empty #77354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce `FIELD_ADDR` and use it for TLS statics and instance class fields #77353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [Android][tests] Replace hardcoded /tmp path #77291
    area-System.IO
  • [mono][interp] Small improvements to get span item #77331
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • WIP: Clean near unmaintainable parallel logic 53593 #76949
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Generate CodeView debug information for .asm files #77084
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement Array.Initialize in C# #77336
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Avoid checking for exceptions after calls to Math icalls. #77347
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome for testing #77133
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Refactor in Folder #64927
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common package 4.3.1 references invalid 4.3.0 assembly version for netstandard2.0 #64926
  • Semantic snippets: new snippets don't have tooltips #64925
    Backlog
  • Semantic snippets: `if` snippet can sometimes "eat" leading lines #64924
  • Semantic snippets: in async context `cw` snippet produces code that is not getting simplified #64923
    Backlog
  • Semantic snippets: `cw` snippet adds using even when not necessary #64922
    Backlog
  • CS0219 "The variable is assigned but its value is never used" missing #64921
  • C#11 Required override non-nullable properties can't initialize #64920

Closed

  • Multiline MSBuild properties are passed to analyzers as just empty strings #64917

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64919
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64918
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Save the resx file after a button is added into the WinForm #64910
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic snippets - while snippet #64893
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET Core Identity samples and Identity.UI reveal the user exists via password reset #44703
    Discussions
  • 6.0.10 on Ubuntu 22.10 throws UpdateStatusAfterSocketErrorAndThrowException #44701

PullRequests

Created

  • Blazor Server - Auto reconnect on mobile browsers #44700
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • fixed minor typos #44698
    community-contribution, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update SDK #44601
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation issues for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results' methods #44488
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2027808 #44686
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS app crashes on device when pasting into Entry #10854
  • Support for App Store Monetization Like StoreKit2 and Google Play Badly Needed #10853
  • BoxView is rendered always with a black background #10850
  • A Simple new MAUI Project crashes when use hotrestar with iPhone 7 Plus #10849
  • Different behavior HorizontalStackLayout #10848
  • Settings `-p:MauiXamlCValidateOnly=False` not working on `Debug` configuration #10844

Closed

  • Is there a way to change Shell.TitleView Background color? #10788
  • Unable to build iOS project for iOS 16 simulator on 17.4.0 Preview 4 #10846
  • [iOS] Issue with binaries builts compiled with VS 2022 and Xcode 14 #10760
  • Maui BlazorWebView MacOS issues #10843

PullRequests

Created

  • Dev/test ios fix #10856
  • iOS 13 devices do not allow status bar access #10855
  • Fix Windows CollectionView EmptyView alignment #10845
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Method not found: 'Void Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Update.IUpdateEntry.SetStoreGeneratedValue(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IProperty, System.Object)'. in call method _dbContext.SaveChangesAsync() in efCore 7.0.0-rc.2.22472.11 #29410

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix to #29289 - don't print JSON_QUERY calls when we extract the entire aggregate #29407
